name: Fatin Noor Taki
bio: I'm a student from Bangladesh Agricultural University, exploring sustainable farming, crop science, and innovative agricultural technologies. I love learning, experimenting, and sharing knowledge, and I'm passionate about applying data science and ML in the agricultural field (AgriTech).

funFacts.text: Conducting research on hydroponics and vertical farming.
Passionate about sustainable agriculture and food security.
Exploring AI applications for crop disease detection.
Analyzing agricultural data to optimize crop yields.

projects.title: Crop Yield Prediction
projects.description: A machine learning model to predict crop yields based on weather patterns and soil data.

projects.title: Smart Irrigation System
projects.description: An IoT-based system that automates irrigation based on real-time soil moisture levels.

projects.title: Plant Disease Identifier
projects.description: A mobile app that uses computer vision to identify plant diseases from photos.

projects.title: Farm-to-Table Marketplace
projects.description: An e-commerce platform connecting local farmers directly with consumers.

experiences.description: Developed and trained machine learning models for precision agriculture applications, improving crop yield forecasts by 15%.
Assisting in research projects focused on soil health and sustainable farming practices. Published a paper on compost analysis.

educations.degree: International General Certificate for Secondary Education
